item.title: British couple freed after months in Taliban prison
item.description: Barbie and Peter Reynolds, aged 80 and 76, spent eight months in prison with deteriorating health.

item.title: MI6 launches dark web portal to attract spies in Russia
item.description: Outgoing MI6 chief Sir Richard Moore said potential agents in Russia and around the world will be targeted by the UK spy agency.

item.title: Minister rejects Trump's call for military to tackle illegal migration
item.description: US President Donald Trump suggested the military could help tackle illegal migration to the UK.

item.title: Police find remains they think are US man accused of killing his daughters
item.description: The human remains of a man wanted on suspicion of killing his three daughters have been found in Washington state.

item.title: Trump says TV networks opposed to him should 'maybe' lose licence
item.description: Concerns grow that the Trump administration is curtailing criticism after ABC host Jimmy Kimmel's show was cancelled.
